title: Ilyiny
text:
Ilyiny () is a <a href="types%20of%20inhabited%20localities%20in%20Russia">rural locality</a> (a <a href="Village%23Russia">khutor</a>) in <a href="Starooskolsky%20District">Starooskolsky District</a>, <a href="Belgorod%20Oblast">Belgorod Oblast</a>, Russia. The population was 90 as of 2010. There are 3 streets.
Geography.
Ilyiny is located 14 km east of <a href="Stary%20Oskol">Stary Oskol</a> (the district's administrative centre) by road. Kotovo is the nearest rural locality.
